column4: I have got ati radeon 9600. is it possible to get fast xcomposite with it?
just curious what is xcomposite?
cool xorg feature
transparent windows and cool shadows... very fancy
oh would love to get that :) have same card here
heh
do you use the fglrx driver?
yap
It IS possible to get xcomposite working with fglrx driver, but you will get just a mess on the screen :)
you can use new testing xorg radeon driver
is it like xgl
from xorg-x11-7
whats xgl? :)
thanx apokryphos
it is possible to get xcomposite working with xorg driver, but it will be still quite slow
the best option is to use an older radeon card, or just buy nvidia :(
!help
too hard to do that now i run it on my notebook stjepan
thanx apokryphos was looking hi and low for the link but could not find it
then it is hard to get xcomposite working for you (and me) :(
wait and it will be available. Be patient
:D maybe I will be dead before they release a new driver with xcomposite support
wait for xgl on dapper
